name: Red Blood VS Blue Destruction
description:
So, this should be a "tug of war" type of game where you spawn minions, but we kinda got lazy and just had fun with it. 

We'll update the game later :) Maybe....

Trijam version took us 3h11m09s

Sound effects made in BFXR, Graphics in InkScape, Made with Unity.

aferox did the "programming", jdzsk did the "art" and "sound"

Forest background from: https://thedarkbear.itch.io/3-parallax
